alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 15 at 10:48PM CDT until October 15 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CRAWFORD...SOUTHWESTERN WASHINGTON AND SOUTHERN ADAIR COUNTIES... At 1048 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Stilwell, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Stilwell... Mountainburg... Natural Dam... Chester... Lee Creek... Devils Den State Park... Bunch... Strickler... Blackburn... Odell... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 30 and 46. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
